data_table.description: The Phase 1 exam was conducted between 1996 and 2000. This dataset includes current use of aspirin, any nutritional supplements, and medications affecting blood pressure, lipids, diabetes, uric acid, and brain function.

variable.name: ASPIRIN
variable.description: In the last month, have you taken aspirin on a daily basis?

variable.name: meds_HYT
variable.value: Not Taking Medication in Drug Class

variable.name: meds_LIPIDS
variable.value: Not Taking Medication in Drug Class

variable.name: meds_DIABETES
variable.value: Not Taking Medication in Drug Class

variable.name: meds_BRAIN
variable.description: Taking Medication that Affects the Brain?
variable.value: Not Taking Medication in Drug Class

variable.name: meds_UricAcid
variable.description: Taking Medication That Affect Uric Acid?
variable.value: Not Taking Medication in Drug Class

variable.name: meds_NUTRIENTS
variable.value: Not Taking Medication in Drug Class
